BBEX3.M.TRY.EUR.BB.AC.A02: Euro foreign exchange reference rate of the ECB / EUR 1 = TRY ... / Turkey / from January 2005

General: The ECB publishes daily euro foreign exchange reference rates, which are calculated on the basis of the concertation between central banks at 14.15. Currency conversion with effect from 1 January 2005: TRL 1,000,000 = TRY 1. Up to the end of 2004, see BBEX3:M:TRL:EUR:BB:AC:A02.
Methodology: Averages: Bundesbank calculations based on the daily euro reference exchange rates published by the ECB.
